H0.text: What was the capital of the Portuguese empire from 1808 to 1815. Lisbon

H1.text: What was the capital of the Portuguese empire from 1808 to 1815. Rio de Janeiro

H2.text: What was the capital of the Portuguese empire from 1808 to 1815. Salvador

H3.text: What was the capital of the Portuguese empire from 1808 to 1815. BRRIO

A4.text: In 1808, when the Portuguese Royal Court moved to Brazil, Rio de Janeiro became the seat of the court of Queen Maria I of Portugal.

A5.text: The city remained primarily a colonial capital until 1808, when the Portuguese royal family and most of the associated Lisbon nobles, fleeing from Napoleon's invasion of Portugal, moved to Rio de Janeiro.
